summary: CONSUMER STATES HIS VEHICLE STALLS WHILE DRIVING  AT 50MPH. DUE TO FAULTY ENGINE COIL. ON NOVEMBER 10, DEALER CHANGED THE ENGINE COIL #4 ON DECEMBER 26, DEALER CHANGED ENGINE COIL #3, CONSUMER ASKED THE DEALER TO CHANGE THE OTHER 4  INOPERABLE  COILS AND DEALER REFUSED. PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION. TS
